import { Outlet, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Fragment, useContext } from 'react' import { UserContext } from '../../contexts/user.contexts' import {signOutUser ,setCurrentUser} from '../../utils/firebase/firebase.utils' import { ReactComponent as CrownLogo } from '../../assets/crown.svg' import './navigation.styles.scss' const Navigation = () => { const { currentUser } = useContext(UserContext) const signOutHandler = async () => { await signOutUser(); } return (
SHOP {currentUser ? SIGN OUT : SIGN IN }
) } export default Navigation
